title: shrI pavamAna kumAram
sahitya:
shrI pavamAna kumAram santatam bhajEham munigaNanuta
tApatraya rahitam shrI rAmacandra padayuga sEvana niratam


anupallavi

  gAna jnAnapradAyakam sanjIvini auSadEna saumitrOdhaArakam
dInapAlakam nava vyAkaraNa paripoSakam janakajA shoka vinAshakam


caraNam    pInavrtta mahAbAhum nAnA ratnArOkrta deham bhajEham
vAnara kula shEkharam kapaTa dAnava kulabhayakaram shrIkaram
anjanAdEvi suputram sugrIva mitram dashagrIva shatrum
AnjanEyam parama yogijana bhAgadheyam sadAshivakavi nutAbhidheyam
